body:
You have to throw a user interpretable error for every user-hittable thing. Asserts are only appropriate for errors that indicate a bug in the compiler.
```torch.jit.fork(foo, a=5)` will trigger attributes.```
body_html:
You have to throw a user interpretable error for every user-hittable thing. Asserts are only appropriate for errors that indicate a bug in the compiler.
torch.jit.fork(foo, a=5)` will trigger attributes.
